issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Combining {{Unpooled.wrappedBuffer}} with Arrow buffers can create corrupted buffers from buffer reuse race-condition.

This change ensures Arrow memory to be accounted by the same BufferAllocator.

RootAllocator will return an ArrowBuf which cooperates with Arrow memory arrow accounting after Netty {{release(1)}} the buffer.
fields.summary: LlapOutputFomatService: Use ArrowBuf with Netty for Accounting
